svg.text: Eth News and Links
Stakers can increase gas limit to 36M
Eth R&D protocol call (All Core Devs)
* Consensus layer focused protocol call (ACDC #147): Pectra upgrade:
Mekong testnet : stable, gas limit increased to 36M Gas limit
increase : restricted by gossip limit, consensus layer teams to check
spec conformity & consider how best to handle gas/gossip limits, gossip
limit won’t be increased for now Pectra-devnet-5 spec : Aim to
launch over the holidays EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL :
replaced by EIP7840 execution layer config to set max & target blob
count EIP7251 max effective balance : minor changes EIP7762
increase min base fee : not included, L2s work around EIP2537 BLS
precompile: gas repricing proposed, final MSM benchmarks required before
ACDE next week Fusaka upgrade: PeerDAS rebasing on top of
Pectra CFI/SFI statuses : considered for inclusion (CFI) EIPs should
be in a future upgrade devnet & scheduled for inclusion (SFI) EIPs will
be in the next upgrade devnet
* Pectra upgrade: Mekong testnet : stable, gas limit increased to
36M Gas limit increase : restricted by gossip limit, consensus layer
teams to check spec conformity & consider how best to handle gas/gossip
limits, gossip limit won’t be increased for now Pectra-devnet-5 spec
: Aim to launch over the holidays EIP7742 uncouple blob count
between CL/EL : replaced by EIP7840 execution layer config to set max &
target blob count EIP7251 max effective balance : minor changes
EIP7762 increase min base fee : not included, L2s work around EIP2537
BLS precompile: gas repricing proposed, final MSM benchmarks required
before ACDE next week
Pectra upgrade:
* Mekong testnet : stable, gas limit increased to 36M
Mekong testnet : stable, gas limit increased to 36M
* Gas limit increase : restricted by gossip limit, consensus layer
teams to check spec conformity & consider how best to handle gas/gossip
limits, gossip limit won’t be increased for now
Gas limit increase : restricted by gossip limit, consensus layer teams
to check spec conformity & consider how best to handle gas/gossip
limits, gossip limit won’t be increased for now
* Pectra-devnet-5 spec : Aim to launch over the holidays EIP7742
uncouple blob count between CL/EL : replaced by EIP7840 execution layer
config to set max & target blob count EIP7251 max effective balance :
minor changes EIP7762 increase min base fee : not included, L2s work
around EIP2537 BLS precompile: gas repricing proposed, final MSM
benchmarks required before ACDE next week
Pectra-devnet-5 spec :
* Aim to launch over the holidays
Aim to launch over the holidays
* EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL : replaced by EIP7840
execution layer config to set max & target blob count
